Topic.Title: Is there a way to display an external website?

Posts.EditableText: Or at least get a www.blahblahblah.com site to open in another window during a game? It doesn't even have to be inside the game, just a link to a website that a player can click and be directed where I need him/her to go. Perhaps this is in the documentation and I just missed it. Sounds like Quest 5 will feature that and more but I was just wondering! Thanks in advance for the help! Mezmriz
Posts.HTML:
Or at least get a www.blahblahblah.com site to open in another window during a game? It doesn't even have to be inside the game, just a link to a website that a player can click and be directed where I need him/her to go.

Perhaps this is in the documentation and I just missed it. Sounds like Quest 5 will feature that and more but I was just wondering!

Thanks in advance for the help!

Mezmriz

Posts.EditableText: This should be easy to add to Quest 5.0, as it uses HTML for output. I've added this request to the Issue Tracker: http://quest.codeplex.com/workitem/526
Posts.HTML:
This should be easy to add to Quest 5.0, as it uses HTML for output.

I've added this request to the Issue Tracker: http://quest.codeplex.com/workitem/526

Posts.EditableText: A possible option to work now, before Quest 5 is finished, is a QR reader. http://qrcode.kaywa.com/ People take a picture of the image with their phones, once they download a QR reader (free), and it'll take them to the URL!
Posts.HTML:
A possible option to work now, before Quest 5 is finished, is a QR reader.
http://qrcode.kaywa.com/

People take a picture of the image with their phones, once they download a QR reader (free), and it'll take them to the URL!
